nodes.text: Star Wars Insider 149 is the 127th issue of the magazine Star Wars Insider and the 57th published by Titan Magazines. It was released on April 22, 2014 and includes the first part of "Blade Squadron," a short story by David J. Williams and Mark S. Williams that is set during Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. The issue's focus is General Grievous, with the newsstand edition featuring him poised to attack, and the comic store exclusive edition featuring a concept art, drawn by Warren Fu, of Grievous accompanied by his MagnaGuards.

General Grievous takes center stage in issue #149 as we look at the life and times of the sinister Separatist! Best-selling Star Wars author John Jackson Miller nominates five amazing Expanded Universe characters! Get the latest, exclusive news from the making of Star Wars: Rebels and Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens! Plus all the hottest books, comics, and collectibles coming your way!
